summary: Adds 15 new glowing eyes to skyrim and 2 glowing vampire eyes. Enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
I will not be updating this mod anymore. Enyone feel free to use my mod and and add/edit it and upload to nexus, just credit me and leave a link to my original mod, PEACE! :D
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: (Have not tried to use mod manager to install, install manually recommended.)
Here\'s a link to a video with all the eye textures.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QCOBl1ENzI8
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Drop both folders (meshes and textures) ,Glowing Vampire Eyes.esp and Glowing Eyes.esp 
into your data folder. Done!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you wish to change the textures of the eyes you can edit them with gimp,
photoshop, etc, all you need is a plugin to open .dds files.
To edit the eyes you have to open, lets say dawneye.dds, to edit the glow,
open dawneye_g.dds.
Files located in \"data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\"
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>><IMPORTANT<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
You need both esp\'s for GLOWING VAMPIRE EYES.ESP to work!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Have fun!!:D
author: dumle35
